data_table.description: Brief up-date on general health status and changes that may have occurred since last visit. Data were collected at year 15 (Annual follow-up).

variable.name: Individual_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier

variable.name: GNHLTH32
variable.description: GENERAL HEALTH
variable.comment: Dictionaries were submitted w/some SAS file derived code definitions (extracted by T.Y. - BROAD Institute); where possible, additional code meanings were extracted from submitted document: VALUELBL (or document 'CALCULATED VARIABLES' [phd002771]), and inserted.

variable.name: CMHLTH32
variable.description: HEALTH COMPARED TO OTHERS SAME AGE
variable.comment: Dictionaries were submitted w/some SAS file derived code definitions (extracted by T.Y. - BROAD Institute); where possible, additional code meanings were extracted from submitted document: VALUELBL (or document 'CALCULATED VARIABLES' [phd002771]), and inserted.
